metadata.title: CVE-2024-38627 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: stmclass: Fix a double free in stm_register_device() The put_device(&stm->dev)call will trigger stm_device_release() which frees "stm" so the vfree(stm)on the next line is a double free.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
